issues.description: Provide secure API endpoint for credit card activation with OTP verification and security checks.
Allow users to set initial PIN and reset PIN with OTP verification and security validations.
Handle card renewal process and support card upgrades/downgrades based on usage patterns and eligibility.
Enable users to temporarily freeze/unfreeze their credit cards through mobile app with immediate effect.

issues.task: Minimum due vs total due logic
issues.description: Calculate minimum due amounts and total outstanding with interest calculations and payment allocation logic.
Support automatic payment setup with bank account linking and configurable payment amounts (minimum/full).
Send timely notifications about payment due dates and grace periods to avoid late payment charges.
Allow users to set and modify transaction limits per day, per transaction, and per merchant category.
Enable users to block specific merchant categories or international transactions for security purposes.
Generate virtual credit card numbers for secure online transactions with limited validity and amount.
Monitor and alert users about suspicious transactions based on spending patterns and location analysis.
Calculate and allocate cashback and reward points based on transaction categories and card tier benefits.
Integrate with partner marketplace for reward point redemption including gift cards, travel bookings, and merchandise.
Apply partner merchant discounts and special offers automatically during transactions with real-time validation.
Monitor credit utilization, provide limit increase recommendations, and process limit enhancement requests.
Generate monthly credit card statements and deliver via email/SMS with transaction details and payment information.
Calculate interest on outstanding balances, late payment fees, and other charges according to card terms and conditions.
Handle transaction disputes with merchant communication, chargeback processing, and resolution tracking.
Publish real-time transaction events for fraud detection, analytics, and notification services.
Send alerts when credit utilization crosses predefined thresholds to help users manage their credit health.
